title: Annoying "We're unable to log you in because you may be offline" bug
body: I have a perfect internet connection and it was funny at first but it has been 2 months since I started seeing this messege when I try to log in. The annoying part is that it seems to be fixing itself at random. Sometimes when I delete the "gameflow-patcher-lock:" it works, but sometimes it does not. Sometimes when I open the launcher like an admin it works, sometimes it does not. Or when I log in in here. It seems the problem appears only when I am at home. Because from monday to friday I am using a different internet connection and the launcher is fine, but when I come back home and connect to my WiFi the messege appears.

replies.body:
Your router or firewall settings are likely creating blocks from reaching the authentication server.  See if the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) can help by auto-configuring your firewall settings.  

If that doesn't help, check your router settings as well as antivirus and go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide as well.  This should help clear up anything else that can be causing this snag.  I hope that helps!
And now 3 minutes after I posted this the launcher is fine. :/ I don't know what fixed it. I deleted the gameflow-patcher-lock:  and I loged out and in in here but it didn't help earlier
